renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define f fract 
#define s(a,b) sin(1e3*a+sin(3e2*a))*pow(f(mod(-a*8.,8.)/3.),6.-3.*b)
#define d(a)+exp(-3.*a)*vec2(s(8.*t+a*.3,a),s(8.*t+a*.5,a))
vec2 mainSound( in int samp,float t){return .3*vec2(3.*sin(3e2*t)*pow(f(-t*2.),4.)+.5*sin(4e5*t)*f(-t*2.+.5)d(0.)d(.5)d(1.)d(2.));}
renderpass.name: Sound
